GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.15.78
GSD.description:
btrfs: fix tree mod log mishandling of reallocated nodes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 007058eb8292efc4c88f921752194b83269da085, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit bd989ba359f2acb8bc5f5490e19010fc0a6f8356. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: btrfs: fix tree mod log mishandling of reallocated nodes
